enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Issues relating to greenhouse gas inventories
sentences: This issue was first addressed by SBSTA in plenary on Tuesday, 7 December, and subsequently in informal consultations facilitated by Branca Americano (Brazil) and Helen Plume (New Zealand).
On Tuesday, 14 December, SBSTA adopted conclusions without amendment.
